_meta.note: Org-level brand config for Qinnovate standards body.

org.name: Qinnovate Neural Alliance
org.tagline: Open Standards for the Governance of Neurotechnology
org.slogan: One standard for both sides of the brain.
org.mission: Introducing the heart of neurotechnology, starting governed by neuroethics and neurosecurity principles.

seo.title: Qinnovate Neural Alliance — Open Standards for the Governance of Neurotechnology
seo.description: Open research organization building security standards for brain-computer interfaces. Home of QIF, TARA, and the 11-band neural security model.

qif.full_name: The Quantified Interconnection Framework for Neural Security
qif.subtitle: A Model for Quantum Neural Interfaces
qif.tagline: The governance architecture for neural security
qif.description: A ground-up architectural redesign of BCI security, built from neuroscience constraints. The funnel model, quantum integer, and defense-in-depth rings for quantum neural interfaces.

tara.name: TARA
tara.tagline: One standard for both sides of the brain.
tara.slogan: One standard for both sides of the brain.
tara.etymology: Named after the Buddhist bodhisattva of compassion, the star who guides through darkness.
tara.description: A dual-use mechanism atlas that maps BCI interactions across clinical applications, diagnostic use cases, and risk vectors. Each mechanism entry includes STRIDE threat modeling and CVSS v4.0 scoring alongside its therapeutic context.

oni._comment: Legacy branding, kept for package compatibility
oni.name: ONI Framework

layers._comment: Single source of truth for 14-layer model. L1-L7 Silicon, L8 Gateway, L9-L14 Biology (hourglass/funnel model)

brand_color._comment: The teal where L9 and L10 overlap — two biological layers in harmony.
brand_color.name: Neurosec Teal

stats._comment: Manual stats only. Auto-updating stats (commits, tools) are fetched via GitHub API in docs/index.html
